basic.description:
A course on the history, theory, and practice of animated films. Requirements include a series of screenings, writings, and a practice based critical project.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;24Lb;24Oc;36P)
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Animation Criticism, Theory, Practics

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     A GPA of 2.6 in FILM and (a grade of B- in FILM110 or FILM104&106) and 6.0 units in FILM and registration in a FILM Major or Medial plan, or COCA Spec. or STSC Spec. Plan
Exclusion    No more than 1 course from FILM368; FILM385
